text: Alatala Sɛnbɛn Birin Kanna falan ni ito ra, a naxa, “Selatili a dii xɛmɛn Sorobabeli, n ma walikɛna, na lɔxɔni, n na i tongoma nɛn, n yi i findi n ma taxamaseri yiisolirasoon na,2.23 Na waxatini mangane yi e taxamasenna sama e kɛdi sɛbɛxine ma nɛn alogo muxune xa e yii funfu kolon alo tanpuna. Na yi findɛ e yɛtɛ gbee taxamaseri yiisolirasoon funfun na. bayo n bata i sugandi.” Alatala Sɛnbɛn Birin Kanna falan nan na ra.
